Changes For 1.0.7
[LittleDog Historic Changes]

Changes

This section describes all API and user-visible changes between LittleDog release 1.0.6 and LittleDog release 1.0.7.

LittleDog

  • A bug was fixed in computeFootFK() where it failed to return the correct LD_ERROR_CODE for a non-reachable position, and instead returned LD_OKAY with NaNs for the solutions. We now return the correct error code (out of reach) with a best guess. The problem occurred only when the requested position was too close to the hip. In particular, the feet can not be positioned anywhere within the circle illustrated in figure 11 of the Littledog User's Guide.

Examples

  • Error handling in examples/basic/main.cpp has been updated since it incorrectly freed data that wasn't newed.
  • The examples/calib/calib.pro file has been updated to link against i586_gcc34/liblittledog.a not i586_gcc34_debug.

Generated on Wed Dec 31 14:18:26 2008 for LittleDog API by  1.3.9.1
